about_the_game:
Get set for a high-octane, pulse-pounding RTS adventure that thrusts you into epic WW2 battles! In Terrors of War, you'll take command of vast armies, witness tanks rumbling across the battlefield, and dominate the skies with strategic air support. But it's not just about firepower - it's about strategy. Your supply lines are the lifeline of your army, making every decision crucial.

Forging Your War Machine: Resources and Economy

This real-time strategy experience offers a deep and rewarding resource collection system, reminiscent of classic titles in the genre. Dedicated vehicles gather supplies from designated caches and return them to your nearest depot, laying the foundation for your economic might.

Expanding Your Economic Reach

Terrors of War introduces a richer economic layer by allowing you to capture strategic points of interest. Imagine seizing control of businesses within cities, securing vital farms, or even capturing oil rigs. These captured structures provide a steady stream of additional income, fueling the growth of your war machine. However, this strategy comes with a risk. If your foes choose scorched earth tactics, these buildings can be destroyed, denying both you and your opponents the resources they provide.

Every Resource Matters

Economy isn't just about collecting numbers; it's the lifeblood of your success. You'll feel the weight of every resource decision as you expand your base, unleash game-changing support abilities, and build an unstoppable force. Manage your resources wisely, and victory will be within your grasp.

Strategy on the Edge

High stakes combat that'll leave you breathless! Countering enemy strikes, planning devastating offensives, and unleashing earth-shattering call-ins will have you at the edge of your seat. And this is just the beginning! Terrors of War is constantly evolving, with more epic features and surprises on the horizon.

Special Game Modes: Superweapons

Terrors of War deepens strategic warfare with the inclusion of devastating superweapons, adding a strategic layer to your battles. These weapons of mass destruction, including nuclear bombs, V2 rockets, and the awe-inspiring Schwerer Gustav, can turn the tide in your favor, but acquiring them requires cunning tactics and resource management.

Unlocking Mass Destruction

Each superweapon has a unique scenario you'll need to complete before unleashing its destructive power. For instance, to develop a nuclear bomb, you'll need to capture and hold a secret enemy laboratory for a set time. Once the research is complete (around 10 minutes), you can begin production of the bomb itself. However, deploying it requires specific buildings and technological advancements, ensuring a well-rounded strategy is crucial.

The Railway Cannon: A Battlefield Powerhouse

The railway cannon offers a different approach to superweapons. In this thrilling scenario, you'll race to capture a fortified section of the railway and seize control of the cannon itself. Once secured, you can unleash its fury upon your enemies, bombarding them from afar. But beware! The railway cannon is a double-edged sword. Enemy forces can capture it for themselves, turning its might against you. If they choose destruction over domination, they can even detonate the cannon, forcing you to wait for a new one to arrive with a stronger defensive force. As the match progresses, these guardians become increasingly formidable, adding a strategic race against time to the fight for this devastating weapon.

Designed With Mod Support In Mind

Terrors of War has been developed from the get-go to have mod support. You'll be able to add your own factions, maps and other types of customization to the game. Stay tuned!



The War Machine Needs YOU. Assemble in the Discord!

Join me in this epic journey through Early Access, where your support will shape the future of this ambitious project. Your feedback, bug reports, and suggestions on Discord will directly impact the game's development, making this a truly collaborative experience. Get in on the action, be part of the evolution, and let's conquer the battlefield together!

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depictions of intense war violence, including soldier casualties, vehicle explosions, and building destruction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570 or AMD FX 8370
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, HDD Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
